SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.mapper

Interface NewsArticleMapper

public interface NewsArticleMapper
Mapper interface for converting between NewsArticle and its DTO representations. This interface uses MapStruct to generate the implementation at compile time.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type

    Description

  • Field Details

    • INSTANCE

      static final NewsArticleMapper INSTANCE

  • Method Details

    • newsArticleToShortenedNewsArticleResponse

      ShortenedNewsArticleResponse newsArticleToShortenedNewsArticleResponse(NewsArticle newsArticle)
      Converts a NewsArticle object to a ShortenedNewsArticleResponse object. This method maps the fields of NewsArticle to the corresponding fields of ShortenedNewsArticleResponse.
      Parameters:
      newsArticle - the NewsArticle object to convert
      Returns:
      the converted ShortenedNewsArticleResponse object

    • newsArticleToNewsArticleResponse

      NewsArticleResponse newsArticleToNewsArticleResponse(NewsArticle newsArticle)
      Converts a NewsArticle object to a NewsArticleResponse object. This method maps the fields of NewsArticle to the corresponding fields of NewsArticleResponse.
      Parameters:
      newsArticle - the NewsArticle object to convert
      Returns:
      the converted NewsArticleResponse object

    • localDateTimeToString

      default String localDateTimeToString(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Custom mapper method to convert LocalDateTime to String. This method handles the conversion of a LocalDateTime to its string representation.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - the LocalDateTime object to convert
      Returns:
      the string representation of the LocalDateTime
